summary: This story unfolds 8 years after 'Battle of Hwangsanbeol', which destroyed Baekjae, when Silla-Tang Dynasty union attacks Goguryeo.
cast: Jin-young Jung|Mun-shik Lee|Seung-ryong Ryu|Je-mun Yun|Woo-seon Seon|Min-sang Kim|Chang-gon Song|Kwang-Soo Lee|Shin Jeong-geun|Jeon Gi-Gwang|Seung-su Ryu|Kang Ha-Neul|Jeong Gyu-Su|Seok-yong Jeong|Hyun Joong Kang|Seong-hyeon Ryoo|Yeong-geol Yun|Sang-Hun Lee|Dae-Sung Choi|Ha-bok Yu|Jung-min Hwang|Won-ju Jeon|Dae-yeon Lee|Won-jong Lee|Yong-woo Park|Seung-wan Ryoo
title: Pyeong-yang-seong
